Trade/Device Name(s): LensHooke X1 PRO Semen Quality Analyzer
LensHooke X1 PRO SE Semen Quality Analyzer
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): LensHooke X1 PRO Semen Quality Analyzer
LensHooke X1 PRO SE Semen Quality Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LensHooke X1 PRO and X1 PRO SE Semen Quality Analyzers and accessories for automated human semen analysis including sperm concentration, motility, morphology, and pH.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for automated quantitative analysis of human semen parameters (sperm concentration, motility, morphology, pH) to evaluate male fertility in professional healthcare and home settings; not for comprehensive fertility assessment.
